Work Blog Me
Apr 1, 2016 • work, print, editorial

Forge Press Arts

Project Profile

As arts editor of the student newspaper Forge Press, I was responsible for three to four pages in each fortnightly edition.

Quick facts

  • Designed feature spreads & edited others' work
  • Managed volunteer contributors
  • Managed relationships with press contacts

I was elected arts editor of Forge Press, the University of Sheffield’s student-led fortnightly newspaper. I gathered features, interviews and reviews for four pages per issue, supervising volunteer contributors and copy-editors.

I also brought a new online-first focus to the section, commissioning and developing exclusive online-only content. These often relied on video, audio and photo galleries to augment the narrative, in the style made famous by the New York Times’ landmark 2012 piece, Snow Fall.

hello@joshuahackett.com
